section.title: Anna DÄ…browa
section.content: She is the co-founder of Girls Run the World Project. Anna is an Entrepreneur in the European market and has been running e-commerce in Germany for 3 years.

section.title: Edyta Kawka
section.content: She is the co-founder of the Girls Who Run the World Project. Edyta is a self-made Entrepreneur, an aspiring Author and the Los Angeles 2020 Marathon Finisher.

section.title: Kamil Kiedrzyn
section.content: A blockchain technology enthusiast and a proud NFT collector. Nomadic full stack developer and bootstrapped company lover. ERC-721 maestro.
